name: Officer Jeremy Tomun

motivations.feelaboutpeople: People are tools. Use them for your own goals and discard them.
motivations.valuedpossession: Bowie knife, handed down from father

cyberware: Neural Processor[RFB, BM, WLNK, PLGs, Chip Socket]
gear: Various gear, usually heavy weapons and borg weapons.
history: Jeremy server in the Army with special forces. This is where the fun loving youth became a hardened man. He suffered several injuries during his tour and was augmented each time. This chipped away at his humanity. When he returned to civilian life, and took a gig with the NCPD, C-SWAT division. There his combat skills shined, though the higher-ups fear he will eventually be the hunted. He works closely with Lady J, another C-SWAT officer. Though they don't hang out after work, they do work well together.
playerinfo:
For "NCPD Blues" scenario
Officer Jeremy "Tin" Tomum, C-SWAT NCPD

I like guns. Lots of guns. I like cyberware. Lots of cyberware. Shrink says I should slow down with the metal. She's an idiot. Chrome is better than meat. I see it everyday with C-SWAT. Can't wait to bag this borg. I'm sure he'll have cool chrome that I can take. If those corps complain, well they'll be dealt with if they try to stop me. Bang! Bang! Right in their meaty heads.

Lips - Meat.
Lady J - Cool meat.
Mum - Corporate meat.
Egg - Undertanding meat.
Shade - Dangerous meat.
